meta.name: description
meta.content: Web survey powered by SurveyMonkey.com. Create your own online survey now with SurveyMonkey's expert certified FREE templates.

div.div: We would like your feedback in regards to the at-home learning opportunities from Hallettsville ISD. Please submit one survey for each child.

h4.span: Is the amount of at-home learning work manageable for your child?
If you answered "No" to question 4, which subject's work seems unmanageable?
If you answered "No" to question 4, what are your suggestions to make the work more manageable?
How can we better support at-home learning for your child?
What is working well with at-home learning?

button.class: btn small done-button survey-page-button user-generated notranslate
